items.title: Jim Cramer on Salesforce: “People Don’t Like These Software Companies”
items.description: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer looked at. A caller asked for Cramer’s thoughts on the company, and he replied: “You know what, people don’t like these software companies. Now, we have a small position… [for] my Charitable Trust, because we’ve owned it for years and years and years, I […]
